title: Resolving conflict between neighborhood protocol calibrations
description: Resolving conflict between neighborhood protocol calibrations
content:
Scenario: Resolving conflict between neighborhood protocol calibrations
    Given different Riverside neighborhoods calibrated privacy differently
    And this creates friction when residents move between areas
    When I facilitate resolution of calibration conflicts
    Then we convene: representatives from affected neighborhoods
    And we deliberate: on whether harmonization is needed
    And we consider: if diversity should be preserved or reduced
    And we respect: neighborhood sovereignty within city context
    And we find: pragmatic accommodation of differences
    And we demonstrate: subsidiarity working across scales
    And democratic negotiation: resolves conflicts algorithm cannot
